name: Robo Gladiators
description:
If something covers the top right corner of the game window, enable fullscreen or resize browser window.

--------------------------

One of my projects made while learning about Unity.

Build your robot, destroy enemies, become the most famous Robo Gladiator!

Win fights at arena to get fame points. The more you get, the more towns with new items and enemies are unlocked!

Fight in teams up to 3 robots. This version of the game has the boss fight unlocked at the beginning.

If you spot any bugs, let me know in the comments.

Fill this short survey after playing the game, please.

https://forms.gle/UU3DT1a1mTUuoP9i9
